page.title: 18The Galleyhill Centre.
page.content: The Galleyhill Centre is a community workshop near Stony Stratford. The workshop is convenient for people living in Galleyhill,Wolverton and Fullers Slade. The workshop has become a source for D.I.Y. enthusiasts. All the tools needed are there for your use only. There are instructors who give expert advice on complicated machines. The Galleyhill's glass cutting tools ended up at the Royal Academy.There are also metal work tools(especialy popular with people making models). Galleyhill has 2 Tandy 16k computers and a Memotech 1512 with 128k of ram.The computer has 2 disc drives. The centre offers full facilities for leather work,Pottery,Tiffany glass etc .Tutors assist in every subject. You can work at your own pace and do what you want to do.
